overview: Ben Volkow serves as CEO and co-founder of Traffix Systems bringing to the company more than two decades of experience in R&D, business development and management roles in the telecom industry. He holds two signaling patents and is considered a visionary and industry expert in signaling and Diameter protocol. Prior to founding Traffix, Mr. Volkow filled management roles at leading smartphone manufacturers, and Panasonic Mobile Communications delivering the company’s first European market products. Throughout his career, Mr. Volkow has worked closely with leading tier-1 operators and vendors. Mr. Volkow earned a degree in computer science from Tel Aviv University and is a frequent lecturer on Diameter signaling.
